affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: (时间/顺序)前面的, 前任的

sample.mean: adj. 尚存的；现存的

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 从, 从...离开, 从...向外, 向外

v. 乞求；恳求；哀求；乞求得到

word_mean_info__list.difference: 一般指对未知事物或新生事物的探索、观察与研究。
侧重按一定线索追查出结果。
一般指寻找所需的物件，或对罪犯的搜寻，特指追猎。
语义庄重，语气强，使用广。多暗示做出很大努力去寻求某人或物。

word_group.brief_definition: 探讨……的关系；探索……的关系
探索可能性；探讨可能性

bilingual.source: Do you want to explore the jungle?
Explore how to make good use of time.
bilingual.target: 探索如何充分利用时间。

bilingual.source: The rover begins to explore the surface of Mars.
bilingual.target: 探测车开始探索火星表面。

bilingual.source: We have just started to explore other planets.
bilingual.target: 我们刚刚开始探索其他行星。
探索自传和第一人称叙述。

bilingual.source: So why are we going into space to explore?
bilingual.target: 那么我们为什么要进入太空探索呢？

bilingual.source: There are places to explore, items to collect.
bilingual.target: 有地方可以探索，有物品可以收集。

bilingual.source: Let's explore the world of English together.
bilingual.target: 让我们在英语学习的乐园中一起探索。

bilingual.source: Explore definitions and use new words in context.
bilingual.target: 探索定义并在上下文中使用新词。

list.abstract: 浏览，通过其URL检索资源。如果资源是包含指向其他资源的链接的网页，浏览网页将同时查找已链接资源的URL。
Explore，英文单词，及物动词、不及物动词，作及物动词时意为“探索；探测；探险”，作不及物动词时意为“探索；探测；探险”。

yingyinNormal.en: I have not the studies to begin to explore such questions. Try.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的学识还不足以探索这类问题。试试看。

yingyinNormal.en: Over the next 52 weeks, you and I are going to explore the dynamic world of vexillology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在接下来的五十二周，我们将一起探索旗帜学的奇妙世界。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't need a ticket or tuxedo to explore this incredible performance venue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您不需购买门票或盛装打扮，都可以探索这个令人赞叹的表演场馆。

yingyinNormal.en: Spend some time in the Big Island's interior and explore the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park.
yingyinNormal.zh: 花些时间深入大岛的内陆，并探索夏威夷火山国家公园。

yingyinNormal.en: Then, explore the hundreds stores in the gold souk, and discover why Dubai is known as The City of Gold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后在黄金市集探索过百间商店，发掘迪拜被称为「黄金之都」的原因。

yingyinNormal.en: To explore the souks of the 21st century, head to Dubai Mall, home to a staggering 1200 stores.
yingyinNormal.zh: 至于要探索 21 世纪的商店，您可以到坐拥 1200 间店铺的迪拜购物中心。

yingyinNormal.en: We're in the eighth grade now. We're a year older. We should be able to head off and explore without you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们现在读八年级了，我们又大了一岁，我们应该勇敢向前，在没有你的情况下探索世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Her five-year mission, to explore strange new worlds, to seek out new life and new civilizations, to boldly go where no one has gone before.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她将历时五年，探索未知世界找寻外星生命和文明，开发那些从未被踏足过的地域。

yingyinNormal.en: New York's straightforward grid system makes it an easy city to explore by foot, taxi, or on its subway, which, just like the city never sleeps!
yingyinNormal.zh: 纽约城市规划采用简单的网格系统，令人易于游走这个城市，无论是步行，乘搭的士或者地铁都可以尽情探索，简直像个不夜城！

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Star Trek: The Original Series. The Enterprise was on a five-year mission to explore new worlds. Think of this as your personal five-week mission to do the same.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么说吧，电视剧《星际旅行：初代》进取号开始了一个五年期探索新世界的任务。把这件事也想成是你个人的五周期任务嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: London is very easy to navigate around, and is compact enough to explore on foot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要游览伦敦是一件很容易的事，就算只以步行也没有问题。

yingyinNormal.en: These barriers exist because of how our brains work. First, let's explore the ego barrier.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的大脑决定了这两个障碍的存在。第一咱们看看自负障碍。

yingyinNormal.en: Uh-huh. We're going to explore the effects of tequila shots on a gorgeous 22-year-old woman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们去试试龙舌兰酒在一个22岁尤物身上会有什么作用。

yingyinNormal.en: For a slightly wilder experience explore the jungle paths of the Bukit Timah Nature Reserve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想要更刺激的体验？那便要来到武吉知马自然保护区，在森林小径探险。

yingyinNormal.en: Explore the malls and futuristic architecture of Hong Kong's main business district, Central.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在香港的主要商业区中环，您可以游走各大大小小的商场和富有未来感的建筑物。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, that's a great idea! What? You go have fun with Daddy and I'll explore around here with the kids.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这主意太好了！什么？你跟爸爸出去转转 我带孩子们探探险。

yingyinNormal.en: But be warned, this collection of priceless artworks and antiquities is simply too vast to explore in just one day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但请注意，这里收藏太多珍贵的艺术品和骨董馆藏，不可能在短短一天就全部看完。

yingyinNormal.en: The V.C.S made up a list of potential CEOs. Let's just take a look at the list. Explore it, then decide. Baby steps.
yingyinNormal.zh: 风险投资组列出了有潜力当首席执行官的人员名单，我们看看这份名单。研究一下，然后做出决定，一步一步来。

yingyinNormal.en: In The Hidden Reality, I explore this possibility without presuming any knowledge of mathematics or physics on the part of the reader.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在《隐藏的真相》中，我在不涉及任何数学和物理知识的情况下向读者阐释了这一可能。

yingyinNormal.en: Until the talented Bradshaw is better able to grasp the complexities of married life, she would be better advised to explore the vow of silence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等到才女布莱德肖领悟到婚姻生活的复杂性，我们会建议她最好免开尊口。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 探险；考察；探测；勘探；详尽分析；探索探究
n. 勘探者；探测器；探险家；[医]探针
adj. 未经勘探的；地图未标记的；未经详细评估（或讨论）的

word_family.mean: v. 对…进行探险；对…进行考察；勘探；仔细调查；探讨；仔细考虑；对…进行评估；检查；仔细检查

sense_info_list.en: inquire into or discuss a subject or issue in detail; examine or evaluate an option or possibility

examination_example.sentence: But it is an argument for <highlight>exploring</highlight> consequences first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这是一个首先探索结果的论点。

examination_example.sentence: Each book opens up new avenues of knowledge to <highlight>explore</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每本书都开辟了新的知识探索途径。

examination_example.sentence: The boy is convinced that if he reads enough, he can <highlight>explore</highlight> as many career paths as he likes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个男孩相信，如果他读的书足够多，他可以探索他喜欢的任何职业道路。

sense_info_list.en: travel in or through an unfamiliar country or area in order to learn about or familiarize oneself with it

examination_example.sentence: If you've <highlight>explored</highlight> the area before, keep an eye out for familiar sights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你以前探险过这个地区，留意熟悉的景象。

word_usage.usage:
作动词指“调查”时：
explore指走访并探察某地以了解相关信息。
investigate指查明事故、犯罪、科学问题等的真相。
probe指追查不为人知的事，尤指打探别人不愿透露的事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 探险；考察；探测；勘探；详尽分析；探索探究
adj. 探险的；探索（性）的；探究的
n. 勘探者；探测器；探险家；[医]探针
adj. 未经勘探的；地图未标记的；未经详细评估（或讨论）的

word_family.mean: v. 对…进行探险；对…进行考察；勘探；仔细调查；探讨；仔细考虑；对…进行评估；检查；仔细检查

sense_info_list.en: inquire into or discuss a subject or issue in detail; examine or evaluate an option or possibility

examination_example.sentence: What you need to do is research—have a process, invest time <highlight>exploring</highlight> your options, and eliminate as many things as you can.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要做的是研究，先建立一个过程，投入时间探索你的选择，并尽可能地排除更多的错误。

examination_example.sentence: When you study an author's writing style, don't stop on a single one, but <highlight>explore</highlight> numerous styles instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你研究作者的写作风格时，不要停留在一个风格上，而是要探索众多的风格。

examination_example.sentence: So much research has <highlight>explored</highlight> the way in which collegial (同事的) ties can help overcome a range of workplace issues.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多研究都曾探索同事关系是如何帮助解决一系列职场问题的。

sense_info_list.en: travel in or through an unfamiliar country or area in order to learn about or familiarize oneself with it

examination_example.sentence: The vacationer never has any reason to <highlight>explore</highlight> the island.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 度假者从来没有任何理由去探索这个岛屿。

sense_info_list.en: search for resources such as mineral deposits

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 一般指对未知事物或新生事物的探索、观察与研究。
一般指寻找所需的物件, 或对罪犯的搜寻, 特指追猎。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 探险；考察；探测；勘探；详尽分析；探索探究
n. 勘探者；探测器；探险家；[医]探针

word_family.mean: v. 对…进行探险；对…进行考察；勘探；仔细调查；探讨；仔细考虑；对…进行评估；检查；仔细检查

sense_info_list.en: inquire into or discuss a subject or issue in detail; examine or evaluate an option or possibility

examination_example.sentence: In one the focus could be on building financial success and personal achievement, in another on <highlight>exploring</highlight> and understanding options more fully.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 某个阶段的目标可能是获得财富成就和个人成就，另一个阶段的目标可能是更充分地探索和理解各种选择。

examination_example.sentence: This year, the programs range from one that turns the house into a collaborative essay to one that <highlight>explores</highlight> the meaning of exile.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年，项目多种多样，从在一间房子(墙面)写满协作文章到探索流放的意义，不一而足。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists have <highlight>explored</highlight> this idea with other endearing creatures: babies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们与其他可爱的生物-婴儿一起研究了这个想法。

examination_example.sentence: Studies have <highlight>explored</highlight> evidence that dietary changes can slow inflammation (炎症) , for example, or make the body inhospitable to cancer cells.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究已经找出证据，证明饮食结构的变化可以减缓炎症反应，比如，或者使人体不适用于癌细胞。

sense_info_list.en: travel in or through an unfamiliar country or area in order to learn about or familiarize oneself with it

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 探险；考察；探测；勘探；详尽分析；探索探究
n. 勘探者；探测器；探险家；[医]探针

word_family.mean: v. 对…进行探险；对…进行考察；勘探；仔细调查；探讨；仔细考虑；对…进行评估；检查；仔细检查

sense_info_list.en: inquire into or discuss a subject or issue in detail; examine or evaluate an option or possibility

examination_example.sentence: Some of your interests may not appear to be connected but, once you <highlight>explore</highlight> their depths, you discover that they are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的一些兴趣可能看起来并不相关，但一旦你深入探索，你会发现它们是相关的。

examination_example.sentence: They enjoyed <highlight>exploring</highlight> new places.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们喜欢探索新的地方。

examination_example.sentence: While high school does not generally encourage students to <highlight>explore</highlight> new aspects of life, college sets the stage for that exploration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然高中一般不鼓励学生探索生活的新方面，但大学为这种探索奠定了基础。

sense_info_list.en: travel in or through an unfamiliar country or area in order to learn about or familiarize oneself with it

examination_example.sentence: Instead of taking care of his business, John was often off <highlight>exploring</highlight> nature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约翰经常出去探索大自然，而不是打理他的生意。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 探险; 勘测; 考察

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 探险；考察；探测；勘探；详尽分析；探索探究
n. 勘探者；探测器；探险家；[医]探针

word_family.mean: v. 对…进行探险；对…进行考察；勘探；仔细调查；探讨；仔细考虑；对…进行评估；检查；仔细检查

sense_info_list.en: inquire into or discuss a subject or issue in detail; examine or evaluate an option or possibility

examination_example.sentence: Here you can <highlight>explore</highlight> the universe and the unknown mystery behind it!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这里，你可以探索宇宙及其背后的未知奥秘！

examination_example.sentence: More recently, artists have begun to paint to express their own feelings or <highlight>explore</highlight> ideas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，艺术家开始绘画来表达自己的感受或探索想法。

examination_example.sentence: Kites give us ways to celebrate, relax and <highlight>explore</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 风筝为我们提供了庆祝、放松和探索的方式。

sense_info_list.en: travel in or through an unfamiliar country or area in order to learn about or familiarize oneself with it
sense_info_list.zh: 探险; 勘测; 考察

examination_example.sentence: In 1614, two English captains, John Smith and Thomas Hunt, asked Squanto to help them <highlight>explore</highlight> America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1614年，两位英国船长约翰·史密斯和托马斯·亨特请斯昆托帮助他们探险美国。

examination_example.sentence: Visitors can also <highlight>explore</highlight> caves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 游客还可以探险洞穴。

examination_example.sentence: We wanted to make our way down to <highlight>explore</highlight> the area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们想下山勘考察地区。
